textLayer.description: Adds simple text to the canvas.

logo.description: Center your logo or any image on the canvas.

image.description: Put an image at any place, size, rotation on the canvas.

leftRightReveal.description: Reveals a text or any layer from left to right.

walkReveal.description: Reveals left to right and by small parts.

fadeReveal.description: Fades in scene over last one.

clockReveal.description: Fades in last scene with a clock motion.

slideReveal.description: Reveals scene from left to right.

retrowave.description: Retro nostalgia poster effect with text. [Animated]

retroGrid.description: A retro computer grid as you have seen in classic posters.

vignette.description: Creates darker corners at the edges of the canvas.

colorAlphaReplace.description: Replaces transparent parts with a uniform color.

glitchLines.description: Huge vertical glitch lines (use with care).

blankEffect.description: Know how to code GLSL? Create your own effect!
